text: In Trump We Trust: E Pluribus Awesome! is a 2016 book by American far-right commentator and author Ann Coulter in support of Donald Trump and his 2016 campaign for the presidency of the United States. The e-book was a New York Times bestseller in September 2016. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * ==External links== * After Words interview with Coulter on In Trump We Trust, August 26, 2016 Category:2016 non-fiction books Category:Anti-immigration politics in the United States Category:Books by Ann Coulter Category:Donald Trump 2016 presidential campaign Category:Books about the 2016 United States presidential election Category:Books about Donald Trump Category:Books about the Trump administration Category:English-language books
title: In Trump We Trust
